description:
Add a couple litres of storage wherever you need it. This versatile pack might look like a standard fanny pack, but a hidden sleeve allows you to attach it almost anywhere. Slip it over the sternum strap or hip belt of your backpack or attach it to a compression strap.

  • Dyneena and polyester fabric is highly water-resistant
  • Water-resistant #3 YKK zipper on main pouch
  • Rear sleeve can be threaded onto a hipbelt or sternum strap
  • Waistbelt is removable and wings stow when worn with backpack
  • Internal pockets and key clip
name: Hyperlite Versa Hip Pack - Unisex
